headline: Introducing the New Platforms – BMBIPL & 8IPL!

headline: Win Big: Daily Cash Drops and Mega Rewards!
body: Deepak Chahar will join us as our official brand ambassador at the grand launch event of 8JJ Sports. Don’t miss the excitement on November 29!

headline: 30% WEEKLY CASHBACK: Your Ultimate Casino Win Boost!
body: The Turbanator is in the building! Harbhajan Singh joins as our Official Brand Ambassador joins us for the grand launch of 8JJ Sports. 29th November is going to be BIG!
